title: Aether
description: Aether is a tech conference and hybrid career fair launched in February 2024, with over 1,200 attendees from across 3 countries (mainly Canada, USA, China). It's the first engineering-club hosted tech conference, and the first hybrid career fair in the UofA's history (and one of, if not the only, the first in Canada's history too!)

title: HackED Beta
description: HackEd Beta is 24 hour competition where students complete for prizes by creating either a software and/or hardware project in teams during Reading Week. This event is designed for beginner hackers!

title: HackED
description: Similar to HackEd Beta, HackEd is 24 hour competition where students complete for prizes by creating either a software and/or hardware project in January. This event is designed for hackers of all experience levels!

title: ECE Grad
description: Celebrate your freedom with your friends and classmates in the ECE Department! More details will be shared on discord closer to April. Proudly co-hosted with Electrical Engineering Club and Engineering Physics Club!

title: Geer Week
description: Hosted by the ESS, GEER Week is a light-hearted, friendly competition between the discipline clubs in Engineering. Compete for the glory of our discipline by participating in various events such as Battle of the Bands, Movie Night, and more!

title: General & Special AGM
description: We have 2 AGMs every year to share our club's purpose and upcoming events as well as vote new executives. Junior positions are done in September (Special) and Senior are done in April (General). More info in Discord closer to - everyone interested in encouraged to run!
